oai_dc:dc.dc:title: L'histamine comme indicateur d'alteration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nerisson, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Parathunnus mebachi
Proteus morganii
Proteus mirabilis
Proteus vulgaris
Achromobacter histamineum
Processing fishery products
Biological poisons
Bacterial diseases
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study, the author tries to explain conditions of histamine formation in fish and their results for the public health. Then he gives some results of analysis effected on manufactory conserves.
